'bh', 'id' => 1, 'files' => ['file1.jpg', 'file2.png', 'file3.pdf'] ]; // Virgülle ayrılmış string test $files_string = implode(',', $test_data['files']); echo "Files String: " . $files_string . "
"; // String'den array'e dönüşüm test $decoded_files = explode(',', $files_string); $decoded_files = array_filter($decoded_files); // Boş elemanları temizle echo "Decoded Array: " . print_r($decoded_files, true) . "
"; // Tek dosya test $single_file = 'old_file.jpg'; $single_as_array = explode(',', $single_file); $single_as_array = array_filter($single_as_array); echo "Single file as array: " . print_r($single_as_array, true) . "
"; // Mevcut dosya + yeni dosyalar test $existing_files = ['existing1.jpg', 'existing2.png']; $new_files = ['new1.pdf', 'new2.jpg']; $all_files = array_merge($existing_files, $new_files); $final_string = implode(',', $all_files); echo "Combined files string: " . $final_string . "
"; echo "

Test Results:

"; echo "✅ String encoding/decoding working
"; echo "✅ Multi-file combination working
"; echo "✅ Database format: file1.jpg,file2.png,file3.pdf
"; echo "✅ Multi-file system ready
